import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';

<Meta title="Templates/Components/Criteria" />

# Default Criteria Factory

```jsx
const DefaultCriteriaFactory = (props) => {

	const {Component = Criteria, draggable = true, children, ...otherProps} = props;

	const ComposedCriteria = R.compose(
		withCriteriaConfigLoader,
		withCriteriaDefaultValues,
		withCriteriaPrimaryToolbar,
		withCriteriaSecondaryToolbar,
		R.when(R.always(draggable), withCriteriaDragAndDrop)
	)(Component);

	return (
		<ComposedCriteria {...otherProps}>
			{children}
		</ComposedCriteria>
	);
};
```
